name: unit-42-intel-objects-feed
label: Unit 42 Intel Objects Feed
description:
Unit 42 Intel provides threat intelligence from multiple Palo Alto Networks services. Using Unit 42 Intel data, you can investigate indicators and their behaviors, and use that knowledge to better safeguard your network from malicious activity.

This connector has a dependency on the Threat Intel Management Solution Pack. Install the Solution Pack before enabling ingestion of Threat Feeds from this source.

fields.title: Server URL
fields.description: The URL of the Unit 42 Intel server to which you will connect and perform the automated operations.
fields.tooltip: Specify the URL of the Unit 42 Intel server to which you will connect and perform automated operations.
fields.name: server_url

fields.title: API Key
fields.description: The API key used to access the Unit 42 Intel APIs and perform the automated operations.
fields.tooltip: Specify the API key used to access the Unit 42 Intel server to which you will connect and perform automated operations.
fields.name: api_key

fields.title: Verify SSL
fields.name: verify_ssl
fields.description:
Specifies whether the SSL certificate for the server is to be verified or not. 
By default, this option is set as True.

operations.title: Fetch Indicators
operations.description: Retrieves a list of indicator IDs based on the modified date and the count of records that you have specified.

parameters.title: Modified After
parameters.name: last_pull_time
parameters.tooltip: (Optional) Specify the time the feeds were last pulled from Unit 42 Intel Feed. In this case, the data will be returned from Unit 42 Intel Feed only if the feed has been modified after the specified time.
parameters.description: (Optional) Specify the time when the feeds were last pulled from Unit 42 Intel Feed. The data is returned from Unit 42 Intel Feed only if the feed has been modified after the specified time.

parameters.title: Limit
parameters.name: limit
parameters.tooltip: The maximum number of results to return. Should be 50 or less. Default is 10.
parameters.description: (Optional) Specify the maximum number of results to return. Maximum value is 50. Default value is 10.
